casebody.data:
No. 1724,

Misc.

McLoughlin Manufacturing Corp. et al. v. Wright, U. S. Circuit Judge, et al. Earl D. Yaffe and Jacob E. Yaffe on the motion. Solicitor General Griswold, Arnold Ord-man, Dominick L. Manoli, and Norton J. Come for respondents Wright et al. in opposition.

Motion for leave to file petition for writ of mandamus and/or prohibition denied.
